explanation: [0-0] In a cement courtyard, a young boy in a striped shirt is riding on the back of a strong brown pit bull. The boy is holding tightly onto the dog. Beside a white tiled wall stands a wooden structure. A green wall can be seen in the background. The watermark "@REIDOSPITBULLS" is at the bottom of the screen.

[0-3] The boy climbs onto the dog's back and then slides down. An adult man in a black shirt bends over and supports the boy with his hand, ensuring he lands safely. The dog remains patient and gentle, looking straight ahead.

[3-6] Finally, a hand flashes across the screen. After getting off the dog's back, the boy stands up. The dog opens its mouth, tongue out. The man squats down beside them.
